programs.t: DEFINE read AS READ FILES "/tmp/bidon.csv" (host STRING NOT NULL, time FLOAT NOT NULL, ip_client IP4 NOT NULL, query STRING NOT NULL, response_time FLOAT NULL); DEFINE qps AS SELECT MIN time AS time, SUM 1 AS qps FROM read GROUP BY host, u64(time) COMMIT WHEN COALESCE(in.time > group.previous.time + 2, false) ; DEFINE alert AS FROM qps WHERE qps <= 1 OR qps >= 10 NOTIFY "http://1.2.3.4:567/alert?qps=${qps};"
